modName: Skyrim -Live Action Trailer- Sung by Malukah
summary:
Replaces the short Bethesda intro with an Epic(?) intro.
It contains the famous female cover and some sound effects.
READ THE WHOLE DESCRIPTION FOR DETAILS. YOU NEED TO KNOW THEM.
descriptionHtml:
[color=orange]NOTE 1:[/color] This intro replacement is only available for registered users of the "NEXUS". Due to the large size of the 'bik' file.
[color=orange]NOTE 2:[/color] If you are one of those who install mods very often and you try them over and over again with the "open-close" method. [color=red]I DONT RECOMMEND THIS INTRO.[/color] It can be VERY tedious watch it over and over again. (For there is no "skip" option... not jet)
_______________________________________________________________

When I started up Skyrim to playing the 93 mods I added, the [color=red]"Bethesda Logo"[/color] was not enough epic as the mods are. So I made this Intro to fix that.

It was simple, (well, not really). It was very difficult to get the "Live Action Skyrim" commercial, but when I finally got it, many things were so easy.
First I converted the video in a 'avi' file, I added some sound effects with (an almost) precision and finally, I converted the whole project in a 'bik' file.

If the Video doesn't load in the [color=orange]VIDEO[/color] sections, here's the video:

[youtube]WzaFHVphTco[/youtube]

[color=green]For more information about installing, read the "Read Me" text file.[/color]

[color=red]CREDITS:[/color]
-The Dragonborn Comes (Female Cover by Malukah)
Malukah's Channel: http://www.youtube.com/user/malufenix
-Orock1musicO, and the collaborators: Eidelnos, zeldaxlove64, Triforcefilms andÂ Christina Grimmie (Rest in Peace).
-Skyrim Live Action Commercial by Bethesda Softworks


I hope you all enjoy! Thanks!
(Sorry for my bad english)
author: cristhdyl9551
